title: Rich dynamical behaviors from a digital reversal operation
abstract: arXiv:2408.02527v1 Announce Type: new  Abstract: An operation that maps one natural number to another can be considered as a dynamical system in $\mathbb{N}^+$. Some of such systems, e.g. the mapping in the so-called 3x+1 problem proposed by Collatz, is conjectured to have a single global attractor, whereas other systems, e.g. linear congruence, could be ergodic. Here we demonstrate that an operation that is based on digital reversal, has a spectrum of dynamical behaviors, including 2-cycle, 12-cycle, periodic attractors with other cycle lengths, and diverging limiting dynamics that escape to infinity. This dynamical system has infinite number of cyclic attractors, and may have unlimited number of cycle lengths. It also has potentially infinite number of diverging trajectories with a recurrent pattern repeating every 8 steps. Although the transient time before settling on a limiting dynamics is relatively short, we speculate that transient times may not have an upper bound.

Title: 数字反转操作引发丰富的动力学行为
摘要：arXiv:2408.02527v1 公告类型：新  摘要：可以将一个将一个自然数映射到另一个自然数的操作视为在 $\mathbb{N}^+$ 上的动力系统。例如，Collatz 提出的所谓的 3x+1 问题中的映射被猜测有一个单一的全局吸引子，而其他系统，如线性同余方程，可能是 ergodic。在这里，我们展示了一个基于数字反转的操作具有一系列动力学行为，包括 2 循环、12 循环、其他循环长度的周期吸引子以及逃逸到无穷大的极限动态。这个动力系统有无限数量的周期吸引子，可能还有无限数量的循环长度。它也有可能无限数量的逃逸轨迹，其重复模式每八步重复一次。尽管在到达极限动态之前的时间相对短暂，我们推测时间长度可能没有上限。
